Description: PRMTMEAS – Active power measurement at POI
QRMTMEAS – Reactive power measurement at POI
PREFINT – Output active power reference to battery PSSE WPCMD array
QREFINT – Output reactive power reference to battery PSSE WQCMND array
SOC – State of charge for the battery
PRMTFRMCMD – Remote branch for joint firming (MW)
PLCLCMDEXT – Local active power command for external project (MW)
QLCLCMDEXT – Local reactive power command for external project (MVAR)
PREFEXT – Output active power reference to external project PSSE WPCMD array
QREFEXT – Output reactive power reference to external project PSSE WQCMND array
VSET – Voltage set point for RPCM = 5
VCNTR – Voltage droop center for RPCM = 5
FRZ_FLAG – PPC freeze flag with ‘Tfrzppc’ delay
